name: Courtney Boyd
title: Field Marketing Manager and Food Truck Project & Events Manager

experience.title: Field Marketing Manager
experience.location: Greater Chicago Area, Illinois, United States

summary: Courtney is experienced in Promotions and Marketing with a demonstrated history of working in the entertainment and restaurant industries. Skilled in Partnership Marketing, Food Truck logistics planning, Event Management, Radio Promotions, and Media Relations. She is a strong marketing professional with a Bachelor of Arts (B.A.) in Psychology from the University of South Florida.
normalization_notes: Standardized dates to YYYY-MM format; Added 'United States' to locations where applicable; Expanded location descriptions where possible.
